channel.title: Gnome-extension on 卜平社
channel.description: Recent content in Gnome-extension on 卜平社

item.title: Ubuntu 20.04 下 Wanda the Fish 配置
item.description: 安装 Wanda the Fish 首先安装 Fortunes，Bash 下输入 sudo apt install fortunes sudo apt install fortunes-zh 之后安装 Wanda the Fish： git clone https://gitlab.com/tallero/wandathefish cp -r wandathefish/wandathefish\@arcipelago.org ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions gnome-shell-extension-tool -e wandathefish@arcipelago.org 测试效果： fortune fortune-zh 以及 Gnome-p
